alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 9:12PM CDT until May 06 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FILLMORE AND NORTHERN THAYER COUNTIES... At 912 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Belvidere, or 30 miles north of Belleville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Alexandria and Gilead around 925 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
